price: 38. Mpe tokelaki likolo na mabele mpe manso maye mazali kati na yango pamba te.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا لَٰعِبِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqnā al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā lāʿibīna
